prop.name: publisherLock
prop.description: The publisher lock for the running application.

prop.name: domain
prop.description: The domain from which the application is loaded.

method.name: setPublisherLock
method.description: Sets the subdomain running the application.

parameter.name: $status
parameter.description: The lock status for the application loading. Set true to lock application loading from publisher's library and false for development use.

parameter.name: $domain
parameter.description: The domain from which the application is being loaded. It makes difference when trying to get the running version of the application.

method.name: publisherLock
method.description: Checks whether the subdomain running the application is publisher locked (some market or app center or dashboard). On developer's subdomain it is only application testing.
method.returndescription: Whether the application is being loaded from the published version.

method.name: currentDomain
method.description: Get the current domain where the application is running.

method.name: activate
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: deactivate
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: status
method.returndescription: True if application is in tester mode, false otherwise.
